Value: Black Canyon Limited, together with its subsidiaries, focuses on acquiring, exploring, and developing mineral deposits in Australia. It has an option to acquire 75% interests in the Carawine project consisting of 8 granted exploration licenses covering an area of approximately 793 square kilometers in the East Pilbara region of Western Australia; and the Lofty Range project located in the East Pilbara region of Western Australia. Black Canyon Limited was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Subiaco, Australia.
